The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Item Enchantments ML AC MDB ACP ASF Material Bind Quests
+1 Starter Docent
  • +1 Enhancement Bonus+1 Enhancement Bonus: +1 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
 1 0 None 0 0% [[:|]][[:|]]: Unknown Material: The material for this item is unknown due to the lack of a screenshot or an editor to add it. You can help! Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire
Ancient Gemstone
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Constitution +7 Constitution +7: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Good Luck +2Good Luck +2: This item gives a +2 Luck bonus to all saves and skill checks.
  • Upgrades:
    • 5 Commendation: Clerics of Amaunator adds Amaunator's BlessingAmaunator's Blessing: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.
    • 5 Commendation: Druids of the King's Forest adds Woodsman's GuileWoodsman's Guile: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +4 bonus to your To-Hit and +6 bonus to your Damage on any attack that would be considered a Sneak Attack.
    • 5 Commendation: Purple Dragon Knights adds Knight's LoyaltyKnight's Loyalty: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +3 artifact bonus to your To-Hit and Damage rolls, and a +3 Insight bonus to Natural Armor.
    • 5 Commendation: Villagers of Eveningstar adds Way of the Sun SoulWay of the Sun Soul: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.
    • 5 Commendation: War Wizards adds Battle ArcanistBattle Arcanist: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.
 20
Adamantine Body:+20
Mithral Body:+9
Composite Plating:+3
 None 0 0% GemGem: Items made of gem are generally extremely durable and have a very high hardness. Most commonly used to make trinkets and docents. Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip or Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Lost Thread, End Chest ; Menace of the Underdark: The Darkening, Quest chain end reward
Beholder Plate Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Antimagic SpikeAntimagic Spike: This item was made from powerful antimagic materials. When scoring a critical hit on an enemy with your ranged or melee weapons, the target must make a DC 28 Fortitude save or be unable to cast spells for a brief duration.
  • Telekinesis GuardTelekinesis Guard: When enemies hit you, they may be assaulted by these psychic forces, falling to the ground unless they make a DC 35 Reflex save.
  • Trace of MadnessTrace of Madness: You can almost hear faint, panicked voices when this item is close to you. Perhaps the latent power of this item's hint of madness could be brought out by some catalyst.
  • Metal FatigueMetal Fatigue: The metal plates of this armor sometimes tire you out. When you are damaged there is a small chance that you will become Exhausted.
 14
Adamantine Body:+16
Mithral Body:+7
Composite Plating:+2
 None 0 0% GemGem: Items made of gem are generally extremely durable and have a very high hardness. Most commonly used to make trinkets and docents. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lord of Eyes, Opuloxx chest;
Harbinger of Madness, Quest chain end reward
Bittersnow
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +59%Fortification +59%: +59% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Repair Amplification +14Repair Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming repair healing by +14 (Enhancement bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Physical Sheltering +9 Physical Sheltering +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Parrying +1Parrying +1: +1 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +1 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Seasons of the FeywildSeasons of the Feywild:
    • 2 Pieces Equipped: +10 Artifact bonus to your maximum Hit Points
    • 3 Pieces Equipped: +50 Artifact bonus to your maximum Spell Points.
    • 4 Pieces Equipped: +1 Artifact bonus to all of your Ability Scores
    • 5 Pieces Equipped: +1% Artifact bonus to Dodge
    • 6 Pieces Equipped: +1 Artifact bonus to all spell DCs
    • 7 Pieces Equipped: +5 Artifact bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating

Black Dragonscale Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 10% Armor-Piercing - 10%: Passive: +10% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Acid Resistance +30Acid Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.

Blademark's Docent
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Physical Sheltering +9 Physical Sheltering +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Life ShieldLife Shield: Every time you are hit while wearing a Life Shield item there is a 10% chance you gain 15 temporary hitpoints that last for up to 1 minute.
  • InvulnerabilityInvulnerability: Reduces physical damage by 5, except from attacks from magic weapons. DR 5/magic.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Blue Dragonscale Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Potency +52Potency +52: Passive: +52 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Spell Lore VISpell Lore VI: Passive: All of your spells gain a 6% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Spell Penetration II Spell Penetration II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Electric Resistance +30Electric Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.

Brilliant Docent of the Dawn
  • Aid Aid
    Caster level: 3
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • MagiMagi: This item grants the wearer +100 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.

    • Named: Category:Blue augments

Cormyrian Green Dragonscale Docent
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Acid Resistance +40Acid Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
  • Acid Absorption +20% Acid Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Acid Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Proof Against Poison +10 Proof Against Poison +10: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +10 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11 + their Fortitude save).
  • Power StorePower Store: This item collects and stores magical energy. Any spellcaster can use this energy to partially power their spells. All spells cast while using this item receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.

Composite Plating:+5
 None 0 0% Green DragonscaleGreen Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of green dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from poison. Cormyrian Red Dragonscale Docent
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Fire Resistance +40Fire Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Absorption +20% Fire Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Protection +6Protection +6: Passive: +6 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Seeker +10 Seeker +10: Provides a +10 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +10 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

Cyran Guard (Level 27)
  • +9 Enhancement Bonus+9 Enhancement Bonus: +9 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Elemental Absorption +19%Elemental Absorption +19%: Passive: 19% Enhancement Bonus to Acid, Cold, Fire, Electrical, and Sonic Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments

  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

  • Tumble +12Tumble +12: Passive: +12 Competence bonus to the Tumble skill.
  • Immunity to Slippery SurfacesImmunity to Slippery Surfaces: The wearer of this item is not affected when walking on slippery surfaces.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Striding +25%Striding +25%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 25% bonus to run speed.
  • Melee Alacrity 10%Melee Alacrity 10%: Gain 10% enhancement bonus to Melee attack speed. Does not stack with the Haste spell.
  • Ranged Alacrity 10%Ranged Alacrity 10%: Gain 10% enhancement bonus to Ranged attack speed. Does not stack with the Haste spell.

  • Parrying +6Parrying +6: +6 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +6 Insight bonus to Saves.

Docent of the Claw
  • Nightshield Nightshield
    Caster level: 14
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.
  • Attack Bonus +2Attack Bonus +2: Provides a +2 competence bonus to your attack rolls.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

Epic Docent of Grace
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Dexterity +9 Dexterity +9: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +9 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Balance +17Balance +17: Passive: +17 Competence bonus to the Balance skill.
  • Tumble +17Tumble +17: Passive: +17 Competence bonus to the Tumble skill.
  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

Epic Red Dragonscale Docent
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Eternal FireEternal Fire: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Flaming Burst ability. (This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)
  • Fire Lore +16%Fire Lore +16: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Combustion +111Combustion +111: Passive: +111 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Fire Resistance +36Fire Resistance +36: Passive: +36 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Guard IIFire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Fire damage to your attacker.
  • Incineration GuardIncineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

  • +11 Enhancement Bonus+11 Enhancement Bonus: +11 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fire Absorption +30% Fire Absorption +30%: Passive: 30% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +12 Resistance +12: Passive: +12 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil)Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil): This item can be upgraded. Bring this item to the Overgrown Workbench in the Temple of Elemental Evil and combine it with Rusty Gilled Mushrooms to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
    • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
    • Fortification +150%Fortification +150%: +150% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.

  • +7 Enhancement Bonus+7 Enhancement Bonus: +7 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 15% Armor-Piercing - 15%: Passive: +15% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Acid Resistance +40Acid Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
  • Attuned to HeroismThis relic is attuned to heroic actions. (Special bonus effect! Please see item's specific page for details.)

  • +7 Enhancement Bonus+7 Enhancement Bonus: +7 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +7Protection +7: Passive: +7 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

Fleshshaper's Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Negative Energy Absorption +20%Negative Energy Absorption +20%: This effect absorbs 20% of all negative damage the character would have taken, after all other protections have been penetrated.
  • FleshmakerFleshmaker: Magical insight into the ways of the flesh allow the wearer of this item to receive more effect from healing spells cast on them. +20 Positive Healing Amplification.
  • Disintegration GuardDisintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark, insidious power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them.
  • Trace of MadnessTrace of Madness: You can almost hear faint, panicked voices when this item is close to you. Perhaps the latent power of this item's hint of madness could be brought out by some catalyst.
  • Power DrainPower Drain: This item reserves some of your power in order to function. You lose 30 maximum spell points (or up to 60 if you are a Sorcerer or Favored Soul).

Frostflame Docent
  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fire Lore +12%Fire Lore +12: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Ice Lore +12%Ice Lore +12: Passive: Your Cold spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Fire Resistance +24Fire Resistance +24: Passive: +24 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Cold Resistance +24Cold Resistance +24: Passive: +24 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.

Giantcraft Docent
  • Armor Bonus +5Armor Bonus +5: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +5 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • VengefulVengeful: When its wielder is hit in battle, this weapon has a 10% chance to cause him or her to become full of anger and go into a Rage.
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Giantcrafted Docent
  • ShieldShield
    Caster level: 1
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +75%Fortification +75%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 75% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.

  • Spell TurmoilSpell Turmoil: When casting any damaging Fire, Cold, Acid or Electric spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 Alchemical bonus to Spell Power to one of those energy types for 30 seconds.

  • Sheltering +34 Sheltering +34: +34 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings

  • False Life +51 False Life +51: +51 Enhancement bonus to hit points.
  • Vertigo +15 Vertigo +15: This effect gives a +15 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip and Improved Trip attempts.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

Legendary Red Dragonscale Docent
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Dripping with MagmaDripping with Magma: This Obsidian weapon drips with magma on every swing. Your attacks have a high chance to deal very strong fire damage over time.
  • Fire Lore +22%Fire Lore +22: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 22% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Combustion +151Combustion +151: Passive: +151 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Fire Resistance +54Fire Resistance +54: Passive: +54 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Guard IIFire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Fire damage to your attacker.
  • Incineration GuardIncineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.

Livewood Core (Level 15)
  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Rough Hide +3Rough Hide +3: This item fuses with your body and toughens your skin, providing a +3 Primal bonus to your natural armor.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: +100% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Exceptional Fortification (+10%)Exceptional Fortification (+10%): This item produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and the damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered an Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification

  • +3 Enhancement Bonus+3 Enhancement Bonus: +3 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Cold Absorption +10% Cold Absorption +10%: Passive: 10% Enhancement Bonus to Cold Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +2 Resistance +2: Passive: +2 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil)Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil): This item can be upgraded. Bring this item to the Overgrown Workbench in the Temple of Elemental Evil and combine it with Rusty Gilled Mushrooms to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
    • DuskDusk: Equipping this item engulfs you in twilight shadows. Attacks from enemies have a 10% chance to miss you due to concealment.
    • Fortification +75%Fortification +75%: +75% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
    • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
      • Named: Category:Green augments
      Blue Augments
      • Named: Category:Blue augments
      • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
      • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
      • Fortification: +25% to +100%

      • Named: Category:Yellow augments
      • Deathblock
      • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
      • Immunity: Fear, Blindness

Quorforged Docent of Battle
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Construct Fortification (10%)Construct Fortification (10%): This docent produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +10% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered as Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification.
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Improved False LifeImproved False Life: This item grants the wearer +20 maximum health.
  • Will Save -2 Will Save -2: This item gives a -2 penalty to your Will saves.
  • Suppressed PowerSuppressed Power: This psionic item is powerful, but you sense that it has not unlocked all of its secrets to you at this time.

Restored Dragoncraft Docent
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +7Protection +7: Passive: +7 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Stone Heart
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Protection +6Protection +6: Passive: +6 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • One of the following:
    • Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Strength.
    • Dexterity +8 Dexterity +8: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
    • Constitution +8 Constitution +8: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
    • Intelligence +8 Intelligence +8: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
    • Wisdom +8 Wisdom +8: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
    • Charisma +8 Charisma +8: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Upgrades:
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knight Favor and 15 Commendation: Clerics of Amaunator adds Amaunator's BlessingAmaunator's Blessing: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knight Favor and 15 Commendation: Druids of the King's Forest adds Woodsman's GuileWoodsman's Guile: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +4 bonus to your To-Hit and +6 bonus to your Damage on any attack that would be considered a Sneak Attack.
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knight Favor and 15 Commendation: Purple Dragon Knights adds Knight's LoyaltyKnight's Loyalty: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +3 artifact bonus to your To-Hit and Damage rolls, and a +3 Insight bonus to Natural Armor.
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knight Favor and 15 Commendation: Villagers of Eveningstar adds Way of the Sun SoulWay of the Sun Soul: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knight Favor and 15 Commendation: War Wizards adds Battle ArcanistBattle Arcanist: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Tarnished Blademark's Docent
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Unraveling EnchantmentsUnraveling Enchantments: The enchantments on this item have become unstable and weakened with time, but those serving House Deneith may be able to restore it. Combine this item in Visbane's Folly atop Sentinel's Tower in House Deneith Enclave with a Sigil of the Goat, a Sigil of the Lion, and a Sigil of the Dragon to restore its original enchantments.

Composite Plating:+6
 None 0 0% CrystalCrystal: Crystal weapons are able to overcome the protective damage reduction of many Quori creatures, which can be resistant to other weapons.
Spell failure chances for armors and shields made from crystal are also decreased by 10%. 		Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Bark and the Blade, End chest
University Spellshield's Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Magical Sheltering +22 Magical Sheltering +22: +22 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Fortification +104%Fortification +104%: +104% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Insightful Reflex Save +4Insightful Reflex Save +4: This item gives a +4 Insight bonus to your Reflex saves.
  • Spell Save +7 Spell Save +7: This item gives a +7 Resistance bonus to your saves versus spells.
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Adamantine Body:+15
Mithral Body:+8

 None 0 0% CrystalCrystal: Crystal weapons are able to overcome the protective damage reduction of many Quori creatures, which can be resistant to other weapons.
Spell failure chances for armors and shields made from crystal are also decreased by 10%. 		Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Party 101, End chest
White Dragonscale Docent
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +5Protection +5: Passive: +5 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +4Shield +4: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Cold Resistance +30Cold Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.
 14
Adamantine Body:+17
Mithral Body:+8
Composite Plating:+5
 None 0 0% GemGem: Items made of gem are generally extremely durable and have a very high hardness. Most commonly used to make trinkets and docents. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire White Dragonscale Armor
Wildheart
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +94%Fortification +94%: +94% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Physical Sheltering +19 Physical Sheltering +19: +19 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Repair Amplification +30Repair Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming repair healing by +30 (Enhancement bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • False Life +29 False Life +29: +29 Enhancement bonus to hit points.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • WallwatchWallwatch: While wearing three items from the Wallwatch set, you gain:
    +1 Sneak Attack Die
    +15% Artifact bonus to Fortifiction Bypass
    +10% Artifact bonus to Doubleshot
    +10 Artifact bonus to Ranged Power

  • [ ∅ ] Epic docents‎ (5 P)

  • [ ∅ ] Legendary docents‎ (6 P)
